name: Pathway to Destruction
description:
In the text based adventure you play the part of an engineer in the Research and Development section oft the Institute of Transportation, . In recent years it has become even more important, as with a growing population the global transport system is struggling to cope. A complete collapse has been predicted in a little under five years time.

 You are currently working on the Pathway project which is a new developmental transport system to replace the aging Rapid Transit System (RTS).  As part of the trials you are to be  "particled" (as it is called) from one side of the planet to the other and then back again. 

First your hands and feet started to tingle, then your vision blurred, then... nothing.
